SELECT contacts.companyId, contacts.groupId, contacts.userId, contacts.userName,
contacts.contactId, contacts.departmentId, contacts.imageId, contacts.contactName, contacts.jobTitle, contacts.phoneNumbers, contacts.homePhone, contacts.mobile, contacts.email, contacts.createDate, contacts.modifiedDate, contacts.displayPriority, contacts.contactStatus
FROM contacts
WHERE ((contacts.contactName LIKE ?) OR (contacts.phoneNumbers LIKE ?) OR (contacts.mobile LIKE ?) OR (contacts.email LIKE ?))
AND (contacts.groupId = ?)
AND (contacts.contactStatus = ?)
ORDER BY contacts.displayPriority ASC
